Posts.Content: May 15, 2012 02:15PM bellamarie wrote: i took way more than i needed.. i had my surgry on friday and was home on sat.. i would suggest a little blanket cause its always cold in the hospital. i slept in the hospital gown.. wore jogging pants and zipper sweatshirt and thats what i came home in... and definately your cell phone charger..
